instance.description: core default tuning for all skirmish encounters. New tuning field added to this PBG will automatically propagate to all child PBG's and grandchild PBG's (i.e. "skirmish_attack_default" and its child PBGs + "skirmish_defend_default" and its child PBGs). As a rule of thumb, the default values in this PBG should just be set the same as the default values from the statemodel schema.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: If encounter target is squad, then converting to position to would prevent chasing.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether encounter attackers should destroy all enemy squads within scan radius around the encounter target when "EngageTarget" or "EngageEnemyEnRoute".

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether encounter attackers should destroy all enemy buildings within scan radius around the encounter target when "EngageTarget" or "EngageEnemyEnRoute".

enum.name: key
enum.comment: If clear_enemy_squads or clear_enemy_buildings are set, then setting this to true means encounter attackers all also try destroy enemy squads or buildings that cannot be pathed to or attacked for other reasons. Use with caution.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Terminate the encounter when the designated encounter military target is destroyed.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether to allow the encounter to be interrupted in order to release its squads to help nearby ally clumps. (i.e. whether "TravelToTarget" -> "TeardownToHelpNearbyClump").

enum.name: key
enum.comment: When only a partial path exists between the Encounter squads and the Encounter target, whether the Encounter squads should continue moving to the end of the partial path or should the Encounter just exit right away.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether to allow the encounter to be interrupted when the path to encounter target (building) becomes blocked. (i.e. whether "TravelToTarget" -> "TargetUnreachable").

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether the Encounter squads should cast a targeted ability when arrived at the encounter target.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether to allow encounter to be interruptted when there are weak ally defend encounters to help or ally buildings recently attacked. ("FormUp" or "TravelToTarget" -> "AbortEncounter").

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether the encounter squads should wait for combat (defend) at the final target when it arrives (the "DefendDestination" phase).

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether the Encounter has exclusive ownership of its assigned Squads (that other Encounters cannot grab them).

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether to allow boarding naval transports to move to other islands ("FormUp" -> "SailToTargetIsland").

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether encounter should exit when its cached path detects path blocker to its intended target ("TravelToTarget" or "EngageTarget" -> "EngagePathBlocker").

group.name: value_tuning
group.comment: Indicates if the encounter can accept reinforcements from nearby clumps that are fleeing or running away or unable to continue on their original purpose

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Indicates if the encounter can accept reinforcements from nearby clumps that are fleeing or running away or unable to continue on their original purpose

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Scan range from the center of the formation to look for enemies in meters, used in conjunction with below combat fitness check, set to 0 disable to disable scanning and all below combat exit conditions

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Minimum distance from the encounter target the squads needs to be within to be considered inside encounter area (during combat).

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Maximum radius from leash target that squads can stray to combat enemies or defend allies in "EngageEnemyEnRoute" or "EngageTarget" phases. Leash target can be squads centre or final encounter target. Specify 0 for no leash.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Minimum percentage of squads required to arrive at "FormUp" location before moving on to the next "TravelToTarget" phase. 1.0 implies all squads must arrive.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Maximum wait time (in seconds) for squads to "FormUp" before moving onto the next "TravelToTarget" phase.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: When the current combat fitness ratio of ENEMY vs. ALLY goes above this threshold, encounter exits "TravelToTarget" and transitions to "EngageEnemyEnRoute". Set to -1 disable. Set to a high value (e.g. 0.8) attack only weak enemies we meet. Set to 0 for attack anyone we meet.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Minimum distance from the encounter target the squads needs to be within to be considered arrived at encounter area (during movement phase such as "TravelToTarget").

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Minimum percentage of squads required to arrive at the destination area (to exit "TravelToTarget" phase). 1.0 implies all squads must arrive.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: When encounter is to cast targeted ability, this is the distance that the protectors will try to maintain from the protected formation. Positive value means front protection (with respect to protected formation's forward facing). Negative means back protection. ("CastTargetedAbility" phase).

enum.name: key
enum.comment: When encounter is to cast targeted ability, this is the number of protect squads as a ratio to number of squads in the protected formation. Specify -1 to unlimited. Specify 0 to disable protect (assign no protectors).

enum.name: key
enum.comment: The amount of time to remain idle after the encounter is completed at the final target (i.e. finished the "EngageTarget" phase).

enum.name: key
enum.comment: When the current combat fitness ratio of ALLY vs. ENEMY falls below this threshold, encounter transition to "Fallback" phase. 0 disables.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: An individual squad would "want to fallback" if its current health falls below this threshold. -1.0 disables. Used in conjunction with "fallback_squad_health_percent".

enum.name: key
enum.comment: What percentage of encounter squads "wants to fallback" before we transition to "Fallback" phase. -1.0 disables. Used in conjunction with "fallback_squad_health_threshold".

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Percentage of squads remaining in the encounter before we transition to "Fallback" phase. 0 disables.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: The amount of time in seconds encounter squads should wait for combat (defend) at the final target (if "defend_destination" is set to True).

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether encounter should monitor a cached path to its target and update it at what time interval.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: During siege combat when encounter squads are attacking enemy walls, they will ingore any destroyed wall openings beyond this radius and continue attacking the current wall target. This tuning only has any effect if both "cached_path_update_interval_secs" and "exit_on_path_blocker_detected" tunings are used.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: This is the desired ratio of military to monks. If you have 7 military and you want 3 monks, 7 + 3 = 10 total units. That means you want a ratio of 0.3. (total : monks)

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Encounter cached path tuning. If the current cached path to target is open but is longer than this length, try look for a more direct siege path going through walls.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Ignore these entity unit types when testing encounter exit conditions due to "combat_fitness_threshold", "clear_enemy_squads" or "clear_enemy_buildings".

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Engagment type that classifies the current encounter. Used in Opportunity "TargetUnreachable" and "TargetInvalidated" that affect some state transitions.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: "ai\ai_formation_coordinator" AE blueprint containing combat tunings to use when at final target (i.e. "EngageTarget" phase).

enum.name: key
enum.comment: "ai\ai_formation_coordinator" AE blueprint containing combat tunings to use when still enroute (i.e. "TravelToTarget" and "EngageEnemyEnRoute" phases).

enum.name: key
enum.comment: "ai\ai_formation_path" AE blueprint containing AI threat path tunings that allow encounter squads to automatically avoid threats enroute to target (i.e. "TravelToTarget" phase).

enum.name: key
enum.comment: If encounter target is squad, then converting to position to would prevent chasing.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether encounter attackers should destroy all enemy squads within scan radius around the encounter target when "EngageTarget" or "EngageEnemyEnRoute".

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether encounter attackers should destroy all enemy buildings within scan radius around the encounter target when "EngageTarget" or "EngageEnemyEnRoute".

enum.name: key
enum.comment: If clear_enemy_squads or clear_enemy_buildings are set, then setting this to true means encounter attackers all also try destroy enemy squads or buildings that cannot be pathed to or attacked for other reasons. Use with caution.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Terminate the encounter when the designated encounter military target is destroyed.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether to allow the encounter to be interrupted in order to release its squads to help nearby ally clumps. (i.e. whether "TravelToTarget" -> "TeardownToHelpNearbyClump").

enum.name: key
enum.comment: When only a partial path exists between the Encounter squads and the Encounter target, whether the Encounter squads should continue moving to the end of the partial path or should the Encounter just exit right away.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether to allow the encounter to be interrupted when the path to encounter target (building) becomes blocked. (i.e. whether "TravelToTarget" -> "TargetUnreachable").

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether the Encounter squads should cast a targeted ability when arrived at the encounter target.

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether to allow encounter to be interruptted when there are weak ally defend encounters to help or ally buildings recently attacked. ("FormUp" or "TravelToTarget" -> "AbortEncounter").

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether the encounter squads should wait for combat (defend) at the final target when it arrives (the "DefendDestination" phase).

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether the Encounter has exclusive ownership of its assigned Squads (that other Encounters cannot grab them).

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether to allow boarding naval transports to move to other islands ("FormUp" -> "SailToTargetIsland").

enum.name: key
enum.comment: Whether encounter should exit when its cached path detects path blocker to its intended target ("TravelToTarget" or "EngageTarget" -> "EngagePathBlocker").
